metadata.title: CVE-2019-9187 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
ikiwiki before 3.20170111.1 and 3.2018x and 3.2019x before 3.20190228allows SSRF via the aggregate plugin. The impact also includes readinglocal files via file: URIs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20190228-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20190228-1').
